root.message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 1-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Quality assurance checks for published data will be conducted by the custodian agency along with other supporting agencies.

Not applicable: Original data quality assurance is managed by the custodian agencies for each indicator that is presented under 1.4.1 dashboard.

Assurance de la qualité :

L'information n'est pas disponible actuellement.

Обеспечение качества:

В настоящее время информация недоступна.
